overview: What if we told you there is a science-based “miracle drug” to beat the Inactivity pandemic we are in? What if you could beat diseases like some forms of obesity, diabetes, cancers, high blood pressure, and many more? What if this “miracle drug” could prevent deaths by COVID, and power your immune system to beat many other diseases? Well, it exists. Find the answers in this Documentary.
title: Inactivity Pandemic
